Ibuprofen tablet dosages for children
Age How much? How often
Age 7 to 9 years How much? 200mg How often? Max 3 times in 24 hours
Age 10 to 11 years How much? 200mg to 300mg How often? Max 3 times in 24 hours
Age 12 to 17 years How much? 200mg to 400mg How often? Max 3 times in 24 hours

Where can I find my NHS number?

Descriptors and scores

Score: 5

By December 2022, I have completed a quality improvement project (QIP) or complete audit cycle (for example, first audit/project, action plan and re-audit/assessment to quantify impact of intervention) which has resulted in national change

 Comments None Evidence required

A summary (e.g PowerPoint presentation) covering first QIP/audit, action plan, evaluations/re-audit/assessment to quantify impact of intervention, led by yourself and dates QIP/audit undertaken.

Involvement in the QIP/audit, for example, email acknowledgement of registration of QIP/audit with Clinical Governance team or response from QIP/audit lead.

Written confirmation (signed headed letter) from Educational supervisor or Audit lead for local, regional or national change.

 Maximum number of evidence 3

Non-responsive table within details expander

Where can I find my NHS number?
Descriptors and scores Comments Evidence required Maximum number of evidence

Score: 6

Completion of a PhD with original research

PhD/MD and other higher degrees: must be awarded to get full marks (for example, completed, examined and results awarded).

MDs will not count if they are a standard part of higher training, for example, an MD is standard in some overseas training programmes. You must evidence this by a letter of confirmation or screen shot from the university website.

 PhD certificate 1

Score: 5

Significant involvement in research (for example, 2-year MD with original research) or Chief Investigator of a peer review grant funded multicentre research project

 As above

Signed headed letter from research supervisor/project sponsor confirming your role in the research project and copy of research project summary/abstract

If applicable evidence of your MD is not part of a standard training programme

 3

 As above As above 2

Score: 3

I have had ongoing commitment to research as a co-investigator or recruited a significant amount of patients during the period of study

 As above As above 2

I have been involved with recruitment of participants to research projects or assisted with data collection
